newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Sri Lanka issuing Jun 10-11 diesel, jet fuel tender.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka issuing Jun 10-11 diesel, jet fuel tender.

text.p: Sri Lanka's state-owned Ceylon Petroleum Corp (CPC) is issuing a tender to buy 1.0-percent sulphur gas oil and jet fuel for June 10-11 delivery, cost-and-freight (c-and-f) Colombo, a CPC source said on Friday.
The tender, which seeks 220,000 barrels of gas oil and 80,000 barrels of jet fuel, will close on May 28 and offers will be valid for two days.

In its last tender for June 1-2 delivery, CPC bought from Dutch trader Vitol 250,000 barrels of gas oil at a discount of 14 cents per barrel to Singapore spot quotes and jet fuel at a five-cent discount, c-and-f Colombo.
